name: Super Dungeon Boy
description: 2D platform game focused on intense combat against enemies and exploration of secret areas in dark dungeons full of dangers.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP SP2+ Processor: Intel Core Duo or faster Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: optional DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 135 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 10, 8, 7, Vista Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo or faster Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Geforce 6100, Intel X3000 or Radeon X1300 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 135 MB available space
